verse:
Father Abraham
Has many sons
Has many sons
Father Abraham
I am one of them
So are you
So let us Praise the Lord.

Father Abraham
Has many sons
Has many sons
Father Abraham
I am one of them
So are you
So let us Praise the Lord.

Father Abraham
Has many sons
Has many sons
Father Abraham
I am one of them
So are you
So let us Praise the Lord.
Stand up, Left arm, Right Arm

Father Abraham
Has many sons
Has many sons
Father Abraham
I am one of them
So are you
So let us Praise the Lord.

Stand up, Left arm, Right Arm,
Left leg

Father Abraham
Has many sons
Has many sons
Father Abraham
I am one of them
So are you
So let us Praise the Lord.

Stand up, Left arm, Right Arm,
Left leg, Right leg

Father Abraham
Has many sons
Has many sons
Father Abraham
I am one of them
So are you
So let us Praise the Lord.

Stand up, Left arm, Right Arm,
Left leg, Right leg,
turn around, sit down.
